short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: cURL sharing made fast, safe, easy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save x10 your time on API bug reports. No new tool installs needed. Zero Back & forth communication. Fully secured. Send cUrl request directly via browser. Log the shareable cUrl to Developer Console, to Messenging program (e.g. slack, telegram), and more ...
